description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Create your own board games and try them out with your friends online. Both new pieces and boards can be built using a simple block builder tool, like in Lootfest. There are no movement restrictions, like in real boardgames, making the editor free from scripting. Comes with 16 classic games, that can be both modified and played.
